title: STUFFED CELERY STICKS
directions: In food processor, or blender, process cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise and seasoning salt, OR salt, if using. Process until smooth. Wash celery sticks and dry well (this is important!). Fill celery stalks which have been cut to about 3-inch (7.5 cm) lengths with cream cheese mixture. Sprinkle with grated Cheddar cheese, if using.

Helpful Hints: Around Christmas time, add 1/4 cup chopped pecans for a festive flair for your appetizers. You could also add 2 tbsp finely chopped red onion or red bell pepper. If you like spice, add a bit of hot sauce.
ingredients: 1/8 tsp seasoning salt, OR salt (0.5 mL)
